title: Seattle Proposal Would Raise City's Minimum Wage To $15 An Hour
teaser: Seattle politicians are likely to raise the city's minimum wage to $15 an hour this year â€” the highest big-city wage in the nation. But some of the city's business owners are leery of the $15 mark.
